TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_sipil, title = sipil, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/sipil} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == sipil "nganga, Enterobius vermicularis, kamu nu Ing, pinworm, threadworm zuma ngangan, masazinumay a cilecay, mienengay a cilekal masakeliway a cilekay nu aadipanay nu sawadaa' a cilekay, u sipil a imelang, i hami nu kitakit izaw ku zuma maliwasak. 蟯蟲(學名:Enterobius vermicularis,英語:pinworm,threadworm)別名:針狀蟲,坐蟲, . nilaculan wayway形態 malacilekayay hekal a uzip nu cilekay mahiza u sumanahay kiliw tangah, nuayawan tulul ku bilbil, hekalay a banges mala kibetulay a sapikpik nu tanngah, mahapinang masabangah ku taenucan a takulaw atu masamali mabesu ku mali nu taenucan a takulaw. . ulang a cilekay katanayu' 8~13x0.3~0.5 haw-mi, u kikul mahapinang masazicep, i buwahngu maazih mutuwa' ku tapukian ayaw tutulu a cacay hekal nu bili. tama a cilekay kitanayaan tu uzang, tu 2~5x0.1~0.2 haw-mi, malutlut ku kiku. bwahung maazih ku zuma mahapinang matatakis. pilas nu cilekay masamelac caay kalecalecad, tabaki adidi' 50~60x20~30 haw-mi, pilas nu cilekay masatabakiay a sulit nu ina "D", kibetul ku pidac nu pilas, nayi' ku sataheb nu pilas, pangasul ku pilas nu cilekay, dadawa balaki ku pilas nu cilekay, nilacul hinamazih ku U a silit u adidi'ay a cilekay. 雌蟲體長8~13x0.3~0.5毫米, ,2~5x0.1~0.2毫米, ,大小為50~60x20~30微米,蟲卵呈大寫字母"D"形, U字形幼蟲. nikauzip生活史 u pilas nu cilekay mapalecuh tu 6 a tatukian icelangtu, angangan makay nikaen nu tademaw anucaay makaycihek a nihedup micumud i mamelmelan tu kakaen, micaliway tu kacilemin nu bituka hawsa labu nu pilas a cilekay masatulay ku adidi'ay a cilekay itiza i sabaw tusa a sawada'an mimukmuk patahkal tupudac nu pilas. kilul. masaculayay a cilekay duduc tu pienengan tu mamelmelan pasayza adidi'ay sawada' a malimad muculil, i piculilan nu adidi'ay a cilekay a kinatusa mapidac malacilekay tu, hamin nikahini pakala tu 3~4 a lipay. balaki tu ya cilekay malimad tayza i mangangiway a sawada' atu muciw a katatulesan milasul a matatakis. mamin matatakisa uzang a cilekay malimad pasayza i pabesu'cay a sawada', tiza satu mueneng babi' hawsa, tatai'an mawahwah tu, uzang a cilekay mukayakay tayza i hekal nu tatai'an tiza liwliw nu tatai'an mulecuh tu pilas nu cilekay.paycacay nu uzang a cilekay taneng mulecuh tu 10,000~15,000 ku pilas a cilekay u pilas a cilekay i balian taneng mauzip tu 2~3 a lipay. sipil a adada' "enterobiasis" hinamaazih i lima katukah sabw sepat ku mihcaan nu wawa. angangan a kasahini calenget ku tatai'an, manana' ku bannges. nuzuma, u sipil micumud sawada' nu cabeng a kasadang nu heci, muciw, nayi' ku nikan, amalangat malebawa. u tatayna ku imelangay, namungangaw micumud ku sipil tayza i husu nu tawawaan mapuut tu ku husu nu tawawaan, hakay caay tu kasibili. zuma, pihaceng ku kalalid nu sipil caay kataneng ku kasaiyuan nu uzip, caay kaasu' ku kan, caay kala ku kabi'an,ahemaw ku uzip, hinasaungay, mulesi' ku isi', malawlaw, mingelisngelis ku ngipen, adada ku bili, mabidang atu muuta' a kasahini. zayhan sipil apilecuh tu pilas, i tai' nu cilekay mikinsa caay ka tatungus tu sipil. imahini un kingsa ku kapahay au ngalasu kusapisisis tu liwliw nu tatai'an. sakapahay i sananal miliuc atu ayaw mutai' u sadepit ku sapidepit tu liwliw nu tatai'an, pazeng han ku sadepit i buwahngu amikinsa aizaw ku pilas nu cilekay. lalid tu pina a demiad ku pikinsa apatalakaw tu kalucek amahapinang amiedap. cya-pen-ta-cow "mebendazole" 10mg lalid pacumud tu 3~4 lipay, anucaay 100mg nacacay pacumud zikuz nu tusa a lipay kinacacay pacumud. nika uyni a sapayu patahkal tu musakamu hakay amalawacu' ku biliay a wawa. anucaay cya-pen-ta-cow "albendazole" kanenay a sapayu tu sapipatay tu cilekay. 甲苯達唑(mebendazole)10mg連續投予3~4星期,或100mg (albendazole)等口服驅蟲藥. uyni a sapayu caay ku sapipatay tu pilas nu cilekay, sisa hakay kinapina mukay tinasapayu kya amahemin mangaay. ayaw nu pingaay, huntu pihapinang mibanaw tu lima, mibaca' paliayaw muliyaw malalid, uzuma kanca hamin nu luma'ay pulung han mukan tusapayu. saba tu 6 a bulad a wawa kapahay nu hekalay a sapayu ku sapingaay . malalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaa a natinenngan

== kakiliman == sipil "nganga, Enterobios vermicolaris, kamo no Ing, pinworm, threadworm zoma ngangan, masazinomay a cilecay, mienengay a cilekal masakeliway a cilekay no aadipanay no sawadaa' a cilekay, o sipil a imelang, i hami no kitakit izaw ko zoma maliwasak. 蟯蟲(學名:Enterobios vermicolaris,英語:pinworm,threadworm)別名:針狀蟲,坐蟲, . nilacolan wayway形態 malacilekayay hekal a ozip no cilekay mahiza o somanahay kiliw tangah, noayawan tolol ko bilbil, hekalay a banges mala kibetolay a sapikpik no tanngah, mahapinang masabangah ko taenocan a takolaw ato masamali mabeso ko mali no taenocan a takolaw. . olang a cilekay katanayo' 8~13x0.3~0.5 haw-mi, o kikol mahapinang masazicep, i bowahngo maazih motowa' ko tapokian ayaw totolo a cacay hekal no bili. tama a cilekay kitanayaan to ozang, to 2~5x0.1~0.2 haw-mi, malotlot ko kiko. bwahong maazih ko zoma mahapinang matatakis. pilas no cilekay masamelac caay kalecalecad, tabaki adidi' 50~60x20~30 haw-mi, pilas no cilekay masatabakiay a solit no ina "D", kibetol ko pidac no pilas, nayi' ko sataheb no pilas, pangasol ko pilas no cilekay, dadawa balaki ko pilas no cilekay, nilacol hinamazih ko U a silit o adidi'ay a cilekay. 雌蟲體長8~13x0.3~0.5毫米, ,2~5x0.1~0.2毫米, ,大小為50~60x20~30微米,蟲卵呈大寫字母"D"形, U字形幼蟲. nikaozip生活史 o pilas no cilekay mapalecoh to 6 a tatokian icelangto, angangan makay nikaen no tademaw anocaay makaycihek a nihedop micomod i mamelmelan to kakaen, micaliway to kacilemin no bitoka hawsa labo no pilas a cilekay masatolay ko adidi'ay a cilekay itiza i sabaw tosa a sawada'an mimokmok patahkal topodac no pilas. kilol. masacolayay a cilekay dodoc to pienengan to mamelmelan pasayza adidi'ay sawada' a malimad mocolil, i picolilan no adidi'ay a cilekay a kinatosa mapidac malacilekay to, hamin nikahini pakala to 3~4 a lipay. balaki to ya cilekay malimad tayza i mangangiway a sawada' ato mociw a katatolesan milasol a matatakis. mamin matatakisa ozang a cilekay malimad pasayza i pabeso'cay a sawada', tiza sato moeneng babi' hawsa, tatai'an mawahwah to, ozang a cilekay mokayakay tayza i hekal no tatai'an tiza liwliw no tatai'an molecoh to pilas no cilekay.paycacay no ozang a cilekay taneng molecoh to 10,000~15,000 ko pilas a cilekay o pilas a cilekay i balian taneng maozip to 2~3 a lipay. sipil a adada' "enterobiasis" hinamaazih i lima katokah sabw sepat ko mihcaan no wawa. angangan a kasahini calenget ko tatai'an, manana' ko bannges. nozoma, o sipil micomod sawada' no cabeng a kasadang no heci, mociw, nayi' ko nikan, amalangat malebawa. o tatayna ko imelangay, namongangaw micomod ko sipil tayza i hoso no tawawaan mapoot to ko hoso no tawawaan, hakay caay to kasibili. zoma, pihaceng ko kalalid no sipil caay kataneng ko kasaiyoan no ozip, caay kaaso' ko kan, caay kala ko kabi'an,ahemaw ko ozip, hinasaongay, molesi' ko isi', malawlaw, mingelisngelis ko ngipen, adada ko bili, mabidang ato moota' a kasahini. zayhan sipil apilecoh to pilas, i tai' no cilekay mikinsa caay ka tatongos to sipil. imahini on kingsa ko kapahay ao ngalaso kosapisisis to liwliw no tatai'an. sakapahay i sananal milioc ato ayaw motai' o sadepit ko sapidepit to liwliw no tatai'an, pazeng han ko sadepit i bowahngo amikinsa aizaw ko pilas no cilekay. lalid to pina a demiad ko pikinsa apatalakaw to kalocek amahapinang amiedap. cya-pen-ta-cow "mebendazole" 10mg lalid pacomod to 3~4 lipay, anocaay 100mg nacacay pacomod zikoz no tosa a lipay kinacacay pacomod. nika oyni a sapayo patahkal to mosakamo hakay amalawaco' ko biliay a wawa. anocaay cya-pen-ta-cow "albendazole" kanenay a sapayo to sapipatay to cilekay. 甲苯達唑(mebendazole)10mg連續投予3~4星期,或100mg (albendazole)等口服驅蟲藥. oyni a sapayo caay ko sapipatay to pilas no cilekay, sisa hakay kinapina mokay tinasapayo kya amahemin mangaay. ayaw no pingaay, honto pihapinang mibanaw to lima, mibaca' paliayaw moliyaw malalid, ozoma kanca hamin no loma'ay polong han mokan tosapayo. saba to 6 a bolad a wawa kapahay no hekalay a sapayo ko sapingaay . malalitin to i hekalay ato zomaa a natinenngan
